User instruction: 创建新文档并添加标题"市场调研报告"，添加页眉显示"市场部"。
Feasible API sequence: create_and_save_docx(doc_path, "");add_heading(doc_path, "市场调研报告", level=1);add_header(doc_path, "市场部");

User instruction: 添加二级标题"调研目的"、"调研方法"和"调研结果"。
Feasible API sequence: add_heading(doc_path, "调研目的", level=2);add_heading(doc_path, "调研方法", level=2);add_heading(doc_path, "调研结果", level=2);

User instruction: 在"调研方法"下添加带编号的列表项。
Feasible API sequence: add_list_item(doc_path, "问卷调查", style="List Number");add_list_item(doc_path, "深度访谈", style="List Number");add_list_item(doc_path, "数据分析", style="List Number");

User instruction: 在"调研结果"下插入一个饼图展示用户偏好分布。
Feasible API sequence: create_pie_chart(["产品A", "产品B", "产品C", "其他"], [40, 30, 20, 10], title="用户偏好分布");

User instruction: 在图表下方添加一个表格展示详细数据。
Feasible API sequence: add_table(doc_path, 5, 3);set_cell_text(table, 0, 0, "产品类型");set_cell_text(table, 0, 1, "选择人数");set_cell_text(table, 0, 2, "占比");

User instruction: 添加页码并设置水印"内部资料"。
